skill.name: web-artifacts-builder
skill.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web technologies (React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui). Use for complex artifacts requiring state management, routing, or shadcn/ui components - not for simple single-file HTML/JSX artifacts.

security_audit.summary: Legitimate frontend development skill. All 56 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The 26 'weak cryptographic algorithm' detections are CSS hsl() color notation for theming. 'Shell command' and 'fs operations' detections are standard project initialization scripts. Network calls only reach npm registry for dependencies. No data exfiltration or malicious behavior detected.

content.value_statement: Creating rich HTML artifacts for Claude conversations requires significant frontend expertise. This skill provides a complete React development environment with shadcn/ui components so you can build professional interactive artifacts quickly.
actual_capabilities: Initialize React plus TypeScript plus Vite projects with one command
Install and configure Tailwind CSS with shadcn/ui theming system
Bundle complete React applications into single self-contained HTML files
Access 40 plus pre-installed shadcn/ui components including dialogs, forms, and carousels
limitations: Does not include runtime testing or preview functionality
Requires Node.js 18 or higher to run scripts
Does not handle artifact deployment or hosting

prompt_templates.title: Basic Artifact Setup

prompt_templates.title: Interactive Demo

best_practices: Run the bundle script after making final changes to generate a clean artifact
Test your React app locally using pnpm dev before bundling
Keep the project folder for future edits and re-bundling
anti_patterns: Do not skip the initialization step when starting new artifacts
Do not modify the bundled HTML file directly - edit source and re-bundle
Do not ignore Node.js version requirements - minimum version is 18

faq.question: What versions of Claude does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude and Claude Code. It generates standalone HTML artifacts compatible with Claudes artifact viewer.

faq.question: How large can the bundled HTML file be?
faq.answer: Artifact size limits depend on Claudes platform. For optimal performance, keep bundles under 5MB by using only necessary components.

faq.question: Can I use this with other component libraries?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill sets up a standard React plus Vite plus Tailwind environment. You can add any npm package compatible with this stack.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. All processing happens locally on your machine. The skill only downloads packages from the official npm registry.

faq.question: Why is my artifact not rendering correctly?
faq.answer: Ensure you bundled after making changes. Check that index.html exists in the project root. The artifact must be a complete self-contained HTML file.

faq.question: How is this different from simple HTML artifacts?
faq.answer: This skill enables complex React applications with state management, routing, and 40 plus pre-built components. Simple HTML artifacts cannot match this capability.
